about_the_game:
MidEvil is a single-player, multiplayer, or co-op open-world survival RPG that takes place in a vast 20km medieval island setting. Players start shipwrecked on the zombie-infested island with nothing. The goals are simple, survive, build, and defend!

Features will include:
  • Large stylized open world.
  • Public and private hosted servers (up to 40 players).
  • Customizable modular characters, clothing, and armor.
  • Skill point leveling system.
  • Fully featured crafting, building, fortification, and raiding system that allows the construction of most structures already on the map as well as some others.
  • Farming system.
  • Hunting and fishing.
  • Animal breeding, taming, and riding.
  • Rewarding combat system with melee, ranged, and mounted combat.
  • PvP and PvE.
  • NPCs, zombies, and guards.
  • Companion AI and pets.
  • Random quest system.
  • Dismemberment system.
  • AI guarded civilized hubs for trading.

Future plans include many more additions such as shipbuilding and siege weapons.
